sections.description:
Plugin platform for managing fitness and nutrition coaching content.

We recommend using this plugin in conjunction with the Paid Memberships Pro plugin, and the PMPro Sequences plugin.
sections.changelog:
Change Log

  1. 0.8.1 - Fix: Correctly handle next weeks activity archive.
  2. 0.8.0 - Enh: e20r_activity_archive shortcode support
  3. 0.7.1 - Bumped to test auto-update
  4. 0.7.0 - Added automatic update functionality
